base.name: LookupTable2d
base.description: The block models non-linearity by mapping inputs to an output value by looking up or interpolating a table of values, in this case, the table is a 2d array, and has 2 breakpoint vectors.

parameter_definitions.name: input_x_array
parameter_definitions.description: Array on which the input is mapped

parameter_definitions.name: input_y_array
parameter_definitions.description: Array on which the input is mapped

parameter_definitions.name: output_table_array
parameter_definitions.description: Array on which the output is mapped

parameter_definitions.name: interpolation
parameter_definitions.description: Interpolation method. Options: [linear, cubic, quintic]. Only linear is supported presently
